title: Homeopathy
description: This pharmacy guide can be used by pharmacists on dealing with requests for homeopathic products. It also outlines our current position with respect to homeopathy.
cleaned_text: This pharmacy guide can be used by pharmacists on dealing with requests for homeopathic products. It also outlines our current position with respect to homeopathy.
